message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1000000 to you, and my proposal aims to ensure a fair exchange while maximizing its worth for me. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $950000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability for both parties involved. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
